medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began today at 9am, described as colicky abdominal pain. Patient experienced nausea but no emesis or diarrhea. Pain was clarified to have started at 7am and was preceded by one previous similar episode 6 months ago that lasted one day and resolved without intervention.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Morbid obesity s/p roux-en-Y gastric bypass, cholelithiasis, chronic bilateral lower extremity edema and venous stasis ulcers, hypertension, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), knee osteoarthritis, history of iron deficiency anemia, endometrial cancer (s/p TAH/BSO), former diabetes mellitus (reversed after RNY gastric bypass).
